info.game_comments: Mike Janela of Guinness World Records presents Alex Trebek with a framed certificate recognizing his hosting record: "The most gameshow episodes hosted by the same presenter (same program) is 6,829 by Alex Trebek on 'Jeopardy!' in Culver City, California, USA as of 17 April 2014".
